about.title: About Me
about.desc: Computer Science student skilled in backend and AI, building scalable solutions with Python, TypeScript, and AWS.

experience.title: Experience
experience.desc: I have worked with various startups and companies to build scalable AI and backend solutions. Here are some of my experiences.

details: Empowering educational institutions with cutting-edge GenAI solutions.
Led backend and AI development for a suite of tools, including AI psychometric reports, AI quizzer, and 24/7 AI tutor.
Collaborated with a team to design scalable systems and deploy AI-driven solutions, improving learning outcomes by 45%.
Implemented AI-driven solutions and optimized backend systems for scalability and performance.
Built multiple AI tools and scripts, including an AI chatbot, as a freelancer.
Developed and maintained scalable production-level backend systems using Python and TypeScript, implementing real-time notifications for mobile apps built with Flutter.
Integrated payment gateways (Razorpay, Stripe) and real-time email notifications with OTP validation, enhancing user experience and security.
Enhanced backend performance, reducing API integration time by 80% and increasing response time by 60%.
Leveraged AWS services (S3, EC2) for scalable deployments, ensuring high availability and reliability.
Built and optimized backend systems for a platform enabling creators, designers, and developers to monetize their skills through subscriptions.
Contributed to delivering scalable solutions to help users transform their expertise into sustainable income streams in under 60 seconds.
Developed machine learning solutions, including a personalized recommendation system and an automated logo generation algorithm using Python and AWS services.
Implemented the Mishal 7B NLP model for automatic plan description generation, enhancing content creation with advanced NLP techniques.
Deployed machine learning microservices on AWS Lambda, integrating with DynamoDB, EC2, and API Gateway to create a scalable serverless infrastructure.
Collaborated on Deep Learning and Backend Integration projects, developing microservices with Python and implementing MLOps methodologies.

education.title: Education
education.desc: I am pursuing my graduation in B.Tech in Computer Science and Information Technology. Here are some of my educational experiences.

skills.title: Skills
skills.desc: Versatile in Python, TypeScript, and Dart. Experienced with AWS, Docker, SQL/NoSQL, and building AI-powered apps using modern frameworks.

certificates.title: Achievements & Certificates
certificates.desc: I have achieved various awards, certifications and completed many courses in the field of Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, and Backend Development. Here are some of my certificates.
